document.heading: Child Development Home License Regulation and Amendment Act of 2013

history.narrative: Law 20-149, the “Child Development Home License Regulation and Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-607. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 24, 2014, and July 14, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Aug. 1, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-418 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-149 became effective on Dec. 17, 2014.
